mapper.insert: insert into tbl_web_release ( rele_title, rele_content, rele_createdate, rele_updatedate, rele_usepk, rele_type, rele_img, rele_order, valid_flag )values ( #{releTitle}, #{releContent}, #{releCreatedate}, #{releUpdatedate}, #{releUsepk}, #{releType}, #{releImg}, #{releOrder}, #{validFlag} )
mapper.update: update tbl_web_release set rele_title=#{releTitle}, rele_content=#{releContent}, rele_createdate=#{releCreatedate}, rele_updatedate=#{releUpdatedate}, rele_type=#{releType}, rele_img=#{releImg}, rele_order=#{releOrder}, valid_flag= #{validFlag} where pk_release=#{pkRelease}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_web_release where pk_release in (${_parameter})
